Agree with Hellraiser5, especially if the image itself is smaller than the combined size of all the RAR chunks ! That doesn't mean to say we don't appreciate what's on offer :-)
fuck  fattas flera filer faan kan man läga ut denna
Är inte OK, ljudet funkar inte i filmen

The point in releasing .rar files is just scene rules. There's many advantages in releasing in that format, for instance if a file is damaged you don't have to throw it all away, you just redownload the damaged file.  I could of course unpack it, but why the hell should I? If you're that damn lazy, then go buy the damn movie instead.

Varför fungerar inte ljudet????

Why doesn´t the sound works?????

Sound doesn't work in PowerDVD or my DVD-player. There is sound in the menu up until the movie starts. I tried choosing the audio track but there is just no sound. Is there a way to fix this so that I won't need to download another one?
The sound actually works in VLC-player. Though that does me no good, as I want to watch in on my DVD-player. I am going to try to edit the DVD to see if I can fix it. Goddamn amateur shit.
Found out that my DVD-player doesn't support DTS, neither does the PowerDVD that I have. VLC has the DTS-plugin. This release is still rather fucked in my opinion.
